00282       static std::size_t extent(const Point &aLowerBound, const Point &aUpperBound)
00283       {
00284         std::size_t val = 1;
00285         for (Size k =  0; k < TSpace::staticDimension ; k++)
00286           val *= (aUpperBound.at(k) - aLowerBound.at(k) + 1);
00287 
00288         return val;
00289       }
